queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory="juniper/mist" AND topic="alarms" AND {{{Keywords}}}
| timeslice 1h
| count as Total by _timeslice, type
| transpose row _timeslice column type
| order by _timeslice

_sourceCategory="juniper/mist" AND topic="alarms" AND {{{Keywords}}}
| formatDate(_messageTime, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss") as date
| count as Total by date, group, type, hostname, severity, site_name, reason
| order by date
| fields -Total

_sourceCategory="juniper/mist" AND topic="audits" AND {{{Keywords}}}
| timeslice 1h
| count as Total by _timeslice, admin_name
| transpose row _timeslice column admin_name
| order by _timeslice

_sourceCategory="juniper/mist" AND topic="audits" AND {{{Keywords}}}
| formatDate(_messageTime, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss") as date
| count as Total by date, admin_name, site_name, message, src_ip, before, after
| order by date
| fields -Total

_sourceCategory="juniper/mist" AND topic="client-join" AND {{{Keywords}}}
| timeslice 1h
| count as Total by _timeslice, ap_name
| transpose row _timeslice column ap_name
| order by _timeslice

_sourceCategory="juniper/mist" AND topic="client-join" AND {{{Keywords}}}
| formatDate(_messageTime, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss") as date
| count as Total by date, ap_name, site_name, ssid, mac
| order by date
| fields -Total

_sourceCategory="juniper/mist" AND topic="device-events" AND {{{Keywords}}}
| timeslice 1h
| count as Total by _timeslice, type
| transpose row _timeslice column type
| order by _timeslice

_sourceCategory="juniper/mist" AND topic="device-events" AND {{{Keywords}}}
| formatDate(_messageTime, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss") as date
| count as Total by date, group, device_name, device_type, site_name, text, type
| order by date
| fields -Total
